Install 

pip install git+https://github.com/samsja/web2dataset.git@master

How to use

Fill me in please! Don't forget code examples:

How to contribute

this project is built with nbdev

first clone the repo

git clone https://github.com/samsja/web2dataset

then install poetry

pip install poetry

then install the dev dependencies with poetry in a virtualenv

poetry install

then activate the virtual env

poetry shell

first install the git hooks

nbdev_install_git_hooks

finaly launch jupyter

jupyter lab

you should try you rmodif

make your modification and built the py files with nbdev

nbdev_build_lib
